name: Conway Consulting Group
overview:
Conway Consulting Group a regional consultancy specializing in Project Management, Business Process Design, Packaged Software Implementation, Organizational Change Management, and Enterprise Technology Strategy services.

Our consulting firm helps organizations to improve business processes using proven technologies to address specific needs translating to higher productivity, lower costs and accelerated return on investment. At CCG, we understand that companies today are minimizing costs. We are capable of delivering onsite and offsite consulting services, depending on the project requirements. We can establish a secure network link from our facility to our clientsâ€™ facility. This technology allows our team of consultants to provide quality implementation and systemsâ€™ services remotely, timely and cost effectively.

Our business is focused in the regions surrounding our office locations. In these markets, we provide an affordable, local alternative to our larger competitors. We bring world-class consulting services to our local marketplace. We focus on transferring knowledge to each team member, making sure they develop their software knowledge and skills, so that by project’s end, they are able to work independently, ultimately saving your organization time and money that might otherwise be spent on continuing consulting support.

Whether it is a new project, upgrade or if you are not getting the most out of your current system, we can provide the specialized services to take your solution to the next level. If you are looking for a partner to obtain operational efficiencies, then Conway Consulting Group is available to help you.
